channel.title: Mixing/ Mastering Engineer Available
channel.description:
It‚Äôs been a long time since I‚Äôve been active here sorry about that. I made this post for anybody who is looking for a mixing and/or mastering engineer for any of their projects. I am available and more than happy to work with you! I would only charge a very affordable amount (a couple dollars if anything at all) and provide you with a nice sounding mix and I‚Äôll even continue to work and make changes if you don‚Äôt like any of the work I‚Äôve done. In case you‚Äôre wondering how credible I am to fill this position I study audio engineering in college (specifically in mixing and mastering but mostly mixing) and I mix and master all of my own tracks. If you have anything you would like me to work on let me know! üòÅ
Edit: It doesn‚Äôt have to be music. If you or somebody you know is working on an Ad I am also able to work on the audio for that as well.
